name: Falgun Fashion House
heading: This is a website of a Inventory Management System
description: ❖ Login, registration, and email confirmation Google and Github popup login, as well as password reset, are supported. ❖ In the Inventory Management section, users can edit, delete, and add items, as well as delete their selected item.❖ Users can also leave feedback.
technology: React, React Bootstrap, Node JS, Express JS,MongoDB

name: Paint Brush
heading: This is a website of Manufacturer Company
description: ❖ Implementing the various types of parts, our business summary, customer reviews, dashboard, order summary, all users list and so on. ❖ Google Popup login system.❖ An admin can make other users admin and control them, but a non user can not.
technology: React,tailwind CSS,DaisyUi, Node JS, Express JS,MongoDB

name: Ahatasam Wild Photography
heading: This is a website of Various types of Wild Photograph
description: ❖ Various types of wild photo display with a lovely button.  ❖ Simple and lovely design. ❖ Google and Github popups, as well as an email login and registration system, have been implemented very.

name: Doctors Portal
heading: This is a website of Online Doctor Appointment
description: ❖ Showing a beautiful design and responsive and Full stack website. ❖ So many feature and also contact form. ❖ Appointment List where you can book your appointment and take serial for your appointment. ❖ You can not book appointment in the same time in a day. If you want to book there shows a toast. ❖ Login system, protected route, admin section, dashboard and many more cool feature
technology: React JS,Tailwind Css, DaisyUi, Node JS, MongoDb, Express js, React query and others.

name: Text Utils
heading: This is a website of Text Utils where you can change your written text into many types.
description: ❖ A simple text box where you can write your text and also You can enable dark mode if you want. ❖ The text what you write you can convert those into Capital, Lower, Copy the whole text, remove extra space if there has any extra space with just one click. ❖ Bottom of the text box there is a feature added where you can see what are you writing in box and what time it takes to write. ❖ There is a Also a Preview section where you can preview your whole text.
technology: React JS, Html5, CSS3, Js Library

name: Watchify
heading: This is a website of a Watch Store
description: ❖ Showing some beautiful watch to buy ❖ You can buy watch and also add your selected watch ❖ Then from the selected where is a featured this site can choose you a watch that is so cool.
technology: React js, React navigation, html5, css3
